instruction: Analyze the impact of dollar strengthening and exclusions of some large companies on the ESG index performance in the third quarter.
output: The dollar strengthening and exclusions of some large companies had a significant impact on the underperformance of ESG indexes in the third quarter. However, allocations to carbon-efficient companies within each sector continued to positively contribute to the performance. We will need to observe closely to see how these factors will continue to affect the ESG index performance for the rest of the year.
